description: A professional network platform built with React and Bootstrap, featuring a customizable dark mode and a user-friendly dashboard for managing profiles and connecting with others.

title: Quiz App
description: A quiz application built with Next.js and CSS, featuring four categories and a customizable dark mode. The user-friendly interface allows seamless navigation between categories, enhancing the overall quiz experience.

title: Products
description: A fully functional e-commerce website built with Next.js and CSS, allowing users to filter and search for products seamlessly. The modern and user-friendly interface provides easy access to products across various categories. Additionally, the site offers a customizable dark mode option for a dynamic and stylish experience.

title: Pomodoro
description: A fully functional Pomodoro timer built with Next.js and CSS, designed to help users boost productivity and manage their time effectively. This sleek and intuitive interface allows users to easily start, pause, and reset their timer, with clear visual cues for work and break intervals. The application also includes a customizable dark mode option, providing a visually pleasing experience while promoting focus and concentration. Whether for work or study, this Pomodoro timer offers a seamless and user-friendly solution to improve time management and enhance focus.
